author: Legolijntje
title: Good content, slightly less good motor.
review:
I bought this set for the LEGO technic tow truck. I think that this set has a reasonable content compared with the new power functions motor set (which I also have).
The shape of the motor is rather annoying, while building the motor doesn't fit in many places.

You also get a good amount of parts. The many gears are very useful.

All in all it is nevertheless a good set.
